summary: Two gun store owners/bounty hunters are forced to get involved in a gun running case that gets them targeted by a ruthless assassin.
cast: Amanda Winn Lee|Michiko Neya|Kimberly Yates|Kae Araki|Rob Mungle|Hôchû Ôtsuka|Tiffany Grant|Aya Hisakawa|Brett Weaver|Daisuke Gôri|Rick Peeples|Michihiro Ikemizu|Marcy Rae|Carol Amerson|Bryan Bounds|Laura Chapman|Matt Greenfield|Allison Keith|Aaron Krohn|Jason Lee|Guil Lunde|Angel Fisher|Andy Orjuela|Lorraine Reyes|Jennifer Rutherford|Doug Smith|Spike Spencer|Thanh Tran|David Williams|Kevin Winkler
title: Gunsmith Cats
